definitions.definition: a series of musical notes, especially one that is pleasant and easy to remember:
examples: He was humming a tune as he dried the dishes.

definitions.definition: singing or playing notes that are at the right pitch (= level) or that agree with others being sung or played
singing or playing notes that are at the wrong pitch (= level) or that do not agree with others being sung or played:
examples: The piano is out of tune.

definitions.definition: to change a part of a musical instrument so that the instrument produces the correct sounds when played:
examples: Get into the habit of tuning your guitar every day before you practise.
